div.head: 肝膽心脾火
div.div: liver fire gallbladder fire heart fire and spleen fire

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: liver fire gallbladder fire heart fire and spleen fire

sense.def: Combined Designation of gan huo 肝火 , liver fire, dan huo 膽火 , gallbladder fire, xin huo 心火 , heart fire, and pi huo 脾火 , spleen fire. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百 病主治藥：黃連，瀉肝膽心脾火，退客熱 , “ Huang lian drains liver fire , gallbladder fire , heart fire, and spleen fire ; it removes visitor heat”.
